summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing shipping charges for services rendered on August 9 and 10, 2004. It includes information about the sender, recipient, and charges associated with the shipments, as well as instructions for payment and adjustment requests.

persons.name: Lauren Kwoitner
persons.context: Lauren Kwoitner is identified as the sender of packages shipped via FedEx, with a billing address listed in New York.

persons.name: Jeff Schantz
persons.context: Jeff Schantz is mentioned as the recipient of a package sent via FedEx, with an address in New York.

persons.name: Paul Burkhardt
persons.context: Paul Burkhardt is mentioned as the recipient of another package sent via FedEx, with an address in New Albany, Ohio.

events.description: Another package was picked up by FedEx for delivery.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 1-943-52024, dated August 13, 2004.
Total charges for the invoice amount to $17.01.
Packages were shipped from New York to recipients in New York and Ohio.
The document includes instructions for requesting adjustments to the invoice.
There are multiple references to FedEx services and charges, including a fuel surcharge.
